languages.text: "Идет. {name}, отыщи Эдельтрада, а затем приведи сюда — в любом состоянии. Этот подъемник..." {n}Теодора указывает на массивные двери.{/n} "Ведет в закрытые отсеки, включая мои личные покои и мостик. Не подведи меня — мне нужны вы оба, ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "Идет. {name}, отыщи Эдельтрада, а затем приведи сюда — в любом состоянии. Этот подъемник..." {n}Теодора указывает на массивные двери.{/n} "Ведет в закрытые отсеки, включая мои личные покои и мостик. Не подведи меня — мне нужны вы оба, ясно?"

languages.text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"
languages.original_text: "Идет. {name}, отыщи Эдельтрада, а затем приведи сюда — в любом состоянии. Этот подъемник..." {n}Теодора указывает на массивные двери.{/n} "Ведет в закрытые отсеки, включая мои личные покои и мостик. Не подведи меня — мне нужны вы оба, ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and return here. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

"Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and return here. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

"Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and return here. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

"Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and return here — in any state. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

"Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

"Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

languages.text: 「では決まったな。{name}、エデルスラドを発見し、ここへ奴がどんな状態であろうと連れてこい。このエレベーターで…」{n}シオドーラは巨大な扉を指さす。{/n}「…私の私室やブリッジといった制限区域に出られる。失望させるな。お前たち二人ともが必要だ、分かっているな？」
languages.original_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: 「では決まったな。{name}、エデルスラドを発見し、ここへ奴がどんな状態であろうと連れてこい。このエレベーターで…」{n}シオドーラは巨大な扉を指さす。{/n}「…私の私室やブリッジといった制限区域に出られる。私を失望させるな。お前たちを頼りにしているぞ、分かっているな？」
「では決まったな。{name}、エデルスラドを発見し、ここへ奴がどんな状態であろうと連れてこい。このエレベーターで…」{n}シオドーラは巨大な扉を指さす。{/n}「…私の私室やブリッジといった制限区域に出られる。失望させるな。お前たち二人ともが必要だ、分かっているな？」

languages.text: “那就这么办吧。{name}，找到艾德萨德，把他带回来，无论他变成了什么样子。”{n}她指了指一旁的巨大门扉。{/n}“……这里可以通往其他封闭区域，例如我的私人房间和舰桥。不要让我失望。我少不了你们两个中的任何一个，明白吗？”
languages.original_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: “那就这么办吧。{name}，找到艾德萨德，把他带回来——活要见人，死要见尸。”{n}她指了指一旁的巨大门扉。{/n}“……这里可以通往其他封闭区域，例如我的私人房间和舰桥。不要让我失望。我少不了你们两个中的任何一个，明白吗？”

languages.text: « Alors, c'est décidé. {name}, partez à la recherche d'Edelthrad et ramenez-le ici... quel que soit l'état dans lequel vous le trouverez. Cet ascenseur... {n}dit-elle en désignant les portes imposantes...{/n} mène aux compartiments à l'accès restreint, comme mes quartiers ou la passerelle. Ne me décevez pas. J'ai besoin de vous deux ; suis-je assez claire ? »
languages.original_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, c'est décidé. {name}, partez à la recherche d'Edelthrad et ramenez-le ici... quel que soit l'état dans lequel vous le trouverez. Cet ascenseur... {n}dit-elle en désignant les portes imposantes...{/n} mène aux compartiments à l'accès restreint, comme mes quartiers ou la passerelle. Ne me décevez pas. J'ai besoin de vous deux ; suis-je assez claire ? »

languages.text: "Dann ist das geklärt. {name}, findet Edelthrad und bringt ihn her — egal, in welchem Zustand. Dieser Aufzug"{n}, sie deutet auf die gigantischen Türen,{/n} "führt zu gesicherten Bereichen wie zum Beispiel meinen persönlichen Gemächern und der Brücke. Enttäuscht mich nicht. Ich brauche Euch beide, verstanden?"
languages.original_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist das geklärt. {name}, findet Edelthrad und bringt ihn her — egal, in welchem Zustand. Dieser Aufzug"{n}, sie deutet auf die gigantischen Türen,{/n} "führt zu gesicherten Bereichen wie zum Beispiel meinen persönlichen Gemächern und der Brücke. Enttäuscht mich nicht. Ich brauche Euch beide, verstanden?"

languages.text: «No se hable más. {name}, encuentra a Edelthrad y tráigalo aquí... en el estado en que se encuentre». {n}Apunta a unas puertas enormes.{/n} «Este ascensor conduce a compartimentos restringidos, como mis aposentos y el puente de mando. No me decepciones. Os necesito a los dos, ¿entiendes?».
languages.original_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"

traits.locale_text: «No se hable más. {name}, encuentra a Edelthrad y tráigalo aquí... en el estado en que se encuentre». {n}Apunta a unas puertas enormes.{/n} «Este ascensor conduce a compartimentos restringidos, como mis aposentos y el puente de mando. No me decepciones. Os necesito a los dos, ¿entiendes?».

languages.text: "Peki o zaman. {name}, Edelthrad'ı bulup buraya getir. Ne vaziyette olursa olsun. Şu asansör..." {n}Devasa kapıları işaret ediyor.{/n} "Seni hususi odam ve köprü gibi erişime kapalı kompartımanlara ulaştıracaktır. Yüzümü kara çıkarma. İkiniz de bana lazımsınız, anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Then it's settled. {name}, find Edelthrad and bring him here — in whatever state you find him. This elevator..." {n}She points at the massive doors.{/n} "...leads to restricted compartments such as my personal chambers and the bridge. Do not let me down. I require you both, do you understand?"
